# Ibai Fernandez Portfolio - Full LLM Index

Last-Updated: 2026-02-27
Base-URL: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/

## Overview
Portfolio focused on Full-Stack architecture, AI automation, UX/UI systems, and enterprise-scale marketing operations.

## Canonical Pages
- Home: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/
  - Purpose: profile, capabilities, work history, project index, testimonials, contact.
- DebTracker: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/project-debtracker.html
  - Purpose: zero-trust financial ledger case (Next.js, Server Actions, Firestore patterns, PWA integration).
- GymTracker: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/project-gymtracker.html
  - Purpose: local-first architecture case (Python/Flask, SQLite, deterministic AI pipelines, QA automation).
- LFi Enterprise CRM: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/project-enterprise-crm.html
  - Purpose: agency intrapreneurship case, promotion timeline, enterprise automation governance.
- National-Scale Tech Evangelism: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/project-national-tech-evangelism.html
  - Purpose: nationwide upskilling and digital adoption program impact.
- Elm St: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/project-elm-st.html
  - Purpose: narrative architecture and custom web/brand system case.
- AGLAYA: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/project-aglaya.html
  - Purpose: remote B2B innovation agency operating model case.
- Dispatches: https://portfolio.ibaifernandez.com/blog.html
  - Purpose: article and publication index.
